name: Cloud Immunity
tag_list: cloud, security, compliance, cloud-security, cloud-compliance, cloud-security-management
overview:
Cloud Immunity is a Big Data powered immune system for the cloud.

Are you a developer trying to build secure cloud applications?

Are you in Ops trying to figure out how to make sure the applications running in the public cloud (IaaS/PaaS) are secure?

Are you in IT trying to figure out how to facilitate the use of the public cloud services in a secure and compliant manner?

Are you using Amazon Web Services, Windows Azure, Google Cloud Services, or other IaaS, PaaS, SaaS cloud services?
